mapper.select: SELECT concat(ifnull(second,'*'),' ',ifnull(minute,'*'),' ',ifnull(hour,'*'),' ',ifnull(date,'*'),' ',ifnull(month,'*'),' ',ifnull(day,'?')) as term FROM schedule_job WHERE jobname = #{jobName}
SELECT triggername FROM schedule_job WHERE jobname = #{jobName}

SELECT packing_business_no, packing_license_no, farm_id_no, egg_usage, storage_method, egg_xxl, egg_xl, egg_l, egg_m, egg_s, egg_e, washing_method, farm_uniq_no, trade_business_no, trade_license_no, trade_term, total_dispose, breading_method FROM schedule_info
SELECT account_nm, account_business_no, account_license_no, egg_xxl, egg_xl, egg_l, egg_m, egg_s, egg_e, total_egg, trade_term, trans_type FROM schedule_account

SELECT packing_business_no, packing_license_no, farm_id_no, egg_usage, storage_method, egg_xxl, egg_xl, egg_l, egg_m, egg_s, egg_e, washing_method, farm_uniq_no, trade_business_no, trade_license_no, trade_term FROM schedule_info

SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over ( ORDER BY m.reg_date asc, m.business_no asc, m.license_no asc ) as num, m.account_nm, m.business_no, m.license_no, n.egg_xxl, n.egg_xl, n.egg_l, n.egg_m, n.egg_s, n.egg_e, n.total_egg, case when n.trade_term = 'D' then '일' when n.trade_term = 'W' then '주' when n.trade_term = 'M' then '월' else '' end as tradeTerm FROM mtrace.account_mgmt m LEFT OUTER JOIN mtrace.schedule_account n ON m.business_no = n.account_business_no AND m.license_no = n.account_license_no ) a order by a.num desc

SELECT m.egg_hist_no, m.egg_hist_idx, m.result_code, m.result_msg, m.report_time, n.trans_info FROM egg_trade m, (SELECT info.egg_hist_idx, GROUP_CONCAT(info.info SEPARATOR '\n\r
') AS trans_info from ( SELECT egg_hist_idx, CONCAT(trans_idx,'. ',account_nm, '(' , CONCAT(substring(trans_date, 1, 4),'/',substring(trans_date, 5, 2),'/',substring(trans_date, 7, 2)) ,', ', total_egg,'개, ',(SELECT c.nm FROM code_secondary c where c.parent_cd = "transType" and c.use_yn = "Y" and c.cd = trans_type ),')') as info FROM egg_trade_detail ) info GROUP BY info.egg_hist_idx ) n WHERE m.egg_hist_idx = n.egg_hist_idx AND m.egg_hist_no = #{histNo}
